subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Lockouts
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: As underclassmen weigh the consequences of leaving early, some college coaches, N.B.A. front-office members and agents are not exactly sure how, and to what extent, the labor situation will ultimately affect the draft class.
snippet: As underclassmen weigh the consequences of leaving early, some college coaches, N.B.A. front-office members and agents are not exactly sure how, and to what extent, the labor situation will ultimately affect the draft class.
